question: Who has been named as the flag-bearer of the Indian contingent for the 3rd Youth Olympic Games 2018?
explanation: Teenage shooting star Manu Bhaker has been named as the flag-bearer of the Indian contingent for the 3rd Youth Olympic Games to be held at Buenos Aires in Argentina from October 6-18. Goa Olympic Association Secretary Gurudutta D Bhakta will be the Chef-de-Mission of the contingent.  It is India\'s largest ever contingent at the Youth Olympics. Hockey 5s has most number of Indian participants with 18 (nine each in men\'s and women\'s team) while track and field has seven athletes. Other Indian participants are: shooting (4), recurve archery (2), badminton (2), swimming (2), table tennis (2), weightlifting (2), wrestling (2), rowing (2), boxing (1), judo (1), sport climbing (1).
